title: British Airways Adjusts Schedules Ahead of Union Activity
text:
British Airways Adjusts Schedules Ahead of Union Activity October 07, 2015 
As ground handlers prepare to strike across a number of different Italian airports, and other trade unions prepare to strike at French airports, British Airways has announced some changes to its schedule for Oct 8. The airline is cancelling the following flights in Italy: LHR-FCO BA546/547, BA560/559, LHR-LIN BA574/575, and BA562/563. In France, the airline said it is expecting only minimal impacts but advised agents and customers to keep checking their flight status on the British Airwaysâ€™ website .
